title: Ep. - 326 - EXECUTIVE PRODUCER OF BLING EMPIRE ROOM 2806: THE ACCUSATION
description:
Kate discusses What Would Sophia Loren Do? On Netflix.

 

Brandon Panaligan is a Filipino American Executive Producer & Showrunner of Netflix's Bling Empire, which follows a wildly wealthy group of Asian and Asian- American friends in Los Angeles.

 

Women & Crime podcast co-hosts Meghan Sacks and Amy Scholsberg help Kate review the Netflix docuseries Room 2806: The Accusation, which focuses on the 2011 sexual assault case involving French politician Dominique Strauss-Kahn. The four-part series explains the details around this high-profile crime case that preceded the #MeToo movement.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey
